description: ミュータント ほぼ 絶滅 荒廃 近未来 ローガン 治癒 能力 失い つつ そんな ローガン 年老い チャールズ・エグゼビア 託し 最後 ミッション 絶滅 危機 ミュータント 唯一 希望 ローラ 謎 めいた 少女 守る 強大 武装組織 襲撃 逃れ 車 荒野 旅 ３ 人 行く手 想像 絶する 運命 待ち受け.

spoiler_reviews.content: 子供 思う 親 気持ち かっこいい 感じる 作品. 背負っ 生きろ.
ミュータント って こんなに 老け ちゃう. 仕方 けど チャールズ アルツハイマー ？ アメコミ こんな 現実感 事 おもしろい ローガン 弱っ ちまっ るし. 哀愁 漂う 面白 でし. ダフネキーン アクション 子 猿 みたい 可愛らしい ジョディフォスター みたい 美形 かっこいい ね. 最後 もっと みんな 能力 使っ ー ❗ ️.

改変 後 未来 描い 本作. 気持ち 半々. ヒュー パトリック 契約 考える. 妥当 終わり 方 思う. シリーズ 見 者 悲しい 終わり. 今 作品 後 公開 作品. 終着 点 思う … ね. フューチャー パスト. アポカリプス. ダーク フェニックス. 違っ 見方 観 じゃ だろ. むしろ 楽しみ 増え. 他 メンバー 世界 なぜ こう. 想像 いい かも ね. 願わくば. もう一度 歴史 改変. 【 ローガン 】 誕生 軸. 作っ 欲しい なぁー ー なんて. 作品. ミュータント ほぼ ウルヴィー. アクション 単調. グロ デップー 寄り かも しれ. 今後 ホラー シリーズ 公開 くらい. 王道 アクション 物 じゃなくて 気. ただ レギオン どう たい. 踏まえ 本作 作っ. それだけ 教え くれ ww.

父. X-MEN. ローガン 観 まし. ヒーロー 映画 括り 勿体ない 作品. ローガン 成長物語 言っ 過言 完全 ヒューマン ドラマ. あまり 語り たく 本音. 喪失感 すごい. 心 ぽっかり 穴 あく って こういう 感じ ね. ローガン シリーズ 完結 編 とにかく 暗い. まさしく 一匹狼 ウルヴァリン らしい 雰囲気 保っ. 今作 ラスト すごく 暖かい 気 今 ローガン 足り 画面 いっぱい 溢れ だし 描か. ローガン 最期 一言 涙。. 感動 しない 人 いない ？ 言う ぐらい 衝撃 的 でし. R1 5 今 思い切っ 豪快 アクション 見れ よかっ ローガン 生き様 しっかり 見届ける 出来. ラストシーン 涙 止まり ませ. 永遠に X-MEN 続け ほしい. ヒュージャックマン お疲れ様 でし.

爪 バッサバッサ 敵 なぎ倒し いく いい ね. 録画 森 逃げ 戦う とこ 切れ 悲しい.

多分 こう だろ 思い やっぱり かー って 涙 止まら. かっこいい ウルバリン 生身 ローガン 十字架 X ゾクっと.

とにかく 子役 表情 凄い. ターミネーター2 的 要素 多い 感じ 久々 見 たく まし. 不穏 感じ 煽る サウンド カッコ いい. 主人公 目覚め シーン 多 気.

Logan was directed by James Mangold and stars of course Hugh Jackman as of course Logan Wolverine in his final portrayal of the c haracter after having played the role for 17 years with Patrick Stewart as of course Charles Xavier. The story is set in the year 2029 when mutants are on the brink of extinction A weary Logan looks after a infirm Professor X at a remote outpost When he meets a little girl who is very much like him his plan to hide himself from the outside world gets inverted Learning that she has been chased by the dark forces whose plan is to turn the mutants into weapons Logan must protect her and battle them The point is who on earth the girl is. Before seeing Logan i d been spending my free time on rewatching all of X men series including Wolverine franchise and Deadpool just in case to make the new one more enjoyable One thing that I really felt after watch ing it was that it was a right choice to rewatch every single X men realising I didn t waste all of my free time on seeing them for the past few weeks I wouldn t have enjoyed that much and cried especially in the end if I hadn t done it I really recommend seeing all of the series before going to the movies for Logan to you all unless you re super busy Although you can just enjoy the film even if you haven t seen it don t really think it would make you cry or it would sometimes make you questionable due to a lack of knowing the previous characters and what had happened before Anyway Watch everything to comprehend the past of Wolverine the relationship between Charles and Wolverine or stuff like that For me Logan is the best ending of all marvel comic films not sure if it really came to an end or not though One thing that I can tell you without spoiling is the scientist who appeared as a villain in X me n2 has a bit of connection with t he blonde guy in Logan. Thanks Hugh Jackman and Patrick Stewart for working for such a bloody long time in X men series and everyone for reading my review of Logan "!.

Hugh Jackman s last movie as Wolverine 😢 😢 😢. Really sad to say But this movie went out on a bang. The tone of the movie and the R rating was what we needed to make this character s conflict shine one last time. The Wolverine outrage is associated with t ons of blood and gore and it just felt right Hats off to Deadpool and Fox for finally giving us this. But it s not just the violence that makes this movie great It s the story about a man who lost all hope for this world get his final shot at getting redemption By saving a little girl who resembles Logan himself. Logan sees himself in this little girl that they call X-23 She is out of control has the same berserk er killer instinct that he has and it s up to Logan to help her follow a better path. What really surprised me was just how different the c haracters were Particularly Logan and Charles They are but a shadow of their former selves They have lost all hope and it was kinda sad to see them like that Hugh Jackman and Patrick Stewart were great It really helps that the X Men franchise has been running for 17 years now because we've grown to love these characters and feel so much for them now that they are in an extremely vulnerable place. Newcomer Dafne Keen through her rage and physical acting brought so much to the c haracter of X-23 Through minimal dialogue she brought so much emotion Perfect casting Let's hope she doesn't turn into some other breakout child actors ....( Anakin John Connor ....). It s such a delight to see a film so different from the X Men series and from a lot of the CG heavy superhero movies today Hope they don t recast Wolverine and let Hugh Jackman s legacy live on .....

17 years Jackman has assumed the persona of the titular mutant ; Logan is the well deserved culmination of that journey Straying away from the overly saturated portal in the sky and other common super heroics tropes Its R rating enables Logan to envision a world filled with b rutality and despair capturing the darker and grittier essence of the established universe Jackman s last outing as the icon ic mutant is poetic and identifiably personal The film present ed itself as an ambitious emotional road trip for the c haracter establishing it as the quintessential backdrop for an iconic farewell Logan is unarguably one of the boldest and most affecting entry in the genre although calling it simply a superhero movie is an under statement.
